release_notes.en-US:
Version 64.8

1) Colors of calendar item boxes were changed to original colors.
2) Themes of version 64.8 are same to version 64.1, but Theme APIs used instead of Experiment APIs.
3) Because that day and week views in calendar were broken in version 64.7, would you use version 64.8?

April 30th 2021.

From Sungho Hwang

description.en-US: I thank core developers who have developed and elaborated theme APIs. Enjoy FrameWhite, FrameBlack and BlueWhite, GreenWhite, RedWhite and LightBlue, LightGreen, LightYellow, LightRed and BlueYellow, GreenYellow, RedYellow themes. In Red-Green-Blue(RGB) colors, light colors with black text colors are more pretty than very deep colors with white text colors. So, I have understood that Light theme was different to Dark theme and differences were not bugs in theme APIs. In short, I have understood that deep RGB colors in background except black or white theme are not such pretty. And, I am not a supported developer. Would you contribute some to me for continuous developments. I have happy dreams by one dollar and fifty cents, like an international postage in minimum not a cup of coffee in high price. March 23rd 2021. [Next improvements] Would you recommend improvements for details of themes? Thank you, 3rdRockGuy. Thank you, lordiron. Thank you, Bill. Thank you, Sadi. March 24th 2020. From Sungho Hwang.

summary.en-US:
Version 64.8 has been released.	
I thank core developers who have developed and elaborated theme APIs.

send a gift to a friend Eunjo.
summary.ko:
버전 64.8이 2021년 4월 30일자로 출시되었습니다.
theme API를 개발하고 다듬은 core developer들에게 감사합니다.

친구 은조에게 선물로 보내며.

2021년 3월 23일.

개발자 황성호.
